tool_description: Generates personalized customer notifications based on shipment status updates, customer preferences, and communication history.

notification_type.description: Type of notification (shipped, in_transit, out_for_delivery, delivered, exception)

language.description: Preferred language code (en, es, fr, etc.)

include_tracking_link.description: Whether to include tracking link in notification

error_messages: Invalid customer_id: Customer ID must be a non-empty string.
Invalid notification_type: Use one of [shipped, in_transit, out_for_delivery, delivered, exception].
Invalid personalization_level: Use one of [basic, standard, premium].
Unsupported language: The specified language code is not supported.
Missing required context: Some required information for the notification type is missing.
usage: Provide customer_id, tracking_number, current_status, notification_type, customer_name, and order_number. Optionally include estimated_delivery, current_location, exception_details, and personalization preferences.

subject_line.description: Email subject line or notification title

call_to_action.description: Suggested customer action or next steps

tracking_url.description: Direct tracking URL for the package
